org.peertrust.protege.plugin
Class SlotPolicyDisplayPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.peertrust.protege.plugin.SlotPolicyDisplayPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class SlotPolicyDisplayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Class for displaying slot policies in a table[Nr,Type,Policy]. It also provide a toolbar with button to add and remove slot policies

$Id: SlotPolicyDisplayPanel.html,v 1.3 2006/09/20 15:25:14 jldecoi Exp $
Date: 30-Oct-2004

Field Detail

selectionListener

private edu.stanford.smi.protege.util.SelectionListener selectionListener
listener delegate used to listen to selectable events and update the the SlotDisplayPanel accordigling. Implemented is the mechanism to listen for events from the TemplateSlotsWidget and transmit the selected slot to the policyTableModel.
